com.beaglebuddy.ape

Class APEFooter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.beaglebuddy.ape.APEFooter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    APEHeader

    public class APEFooter
extends java.lang.Object

    This class provides methods for reading the APE footer in an APE tag. The APE tag footer is found in both APEv1 and APEv2 tags. It is 32 bytes long.

    See Also:
    APEv1 Specification, APEv2 Specification
